00041 static int s_tag_assigner = 0;
00046 #define ctk_dma_new_tag() \
00047     (s_tag_assigner = (s_tag_assigner & 0xf), s_tag_assigner++)
00048 
00054 static inline void ctk_dma_wait(int tag) __attribute__((always_inline));
00055 static inline void
00056 ctk_dma_wait(int tag) {
00057     // wait finishing the transfer
00058     DEBUG_PRINTF("WAITING: tag:%d\n", tag);
00059     spu_writech(MFC_WrTagMask, 1 << tag);
00060     spu_mfcstat(MFC_TAG_UPDATE_ALL);
00061 }
00062 
00070 static inline void ctk_dma_wait_all(int tag_mask) __attribute__((always_inline));
00071 static inline void
00072 ctk_dma_wait_all(int tag_mask) {
00073     // wait finishing the transfer
00074     DEBUG_PRINTF("WAITING: tag mask:%d\n", tag_mask);
00075     spu_writech(MFC_WrTagMask, tag_mask);
00076     spu_mfcstat(MFC_TAG_UPDATE_ALL);
00077 }
00078 
00086 static inline void ctk_dma_wait_any(int tag_mask) __attribute__((always_inline));
00087 static inline void
00088 ctk_dma_wait_any(int tag_mask) {
00089     // wait finishing the transfer
00090     DEBUG_PRINTF("WAITING: tag mask:%d\n", tag_mask);
00091     spu_writech(MFC_WrTagMask, tag_mask);
00092     spu_mfcstat(MFC_TAG_UPDATE_ANY);
00093 }

00103 static inline int ctk_dma_read_tag_status(int tag_mask) __attribute__((always_inline));
00104 static inline int
00105 ctk_dma_read_tag_status(int tag_mask) {
00106     spu_writech(MFC_WrTagMask, tag_mask);
00107     return spu_mfcstat(MFC_TAG_UPDATE_IMMEDIATE);
00108 }

00112 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00113  /* internal routine - DMA transfer for unaligned region */
00114 #ifdef CTK_SPU_RUNTIME
00115 # define ctk_dma_transfer_unaligned(l,e,s,t,c)     /* dummy */
00116 #else
00117 void ctk_dma_transfer_unaligned(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, dma_size_t size, int tag, int cmd);
00118 #endif
00119 
00129 static inline void
00130 ctk_dma_transfer_small(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, dma_size_t size, int tag, int cmd)
00131 {
00132     CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(size < DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE);
00133 
00134     unsigned int ls_mod_15 = ptr2int(ls_addr) & 15;
00135     if (__builtin_expect(ls_mod_15 != (ea_addr & 15) || 
00136                          (ls_mod_15 & (size - 1)), 0))
00137      {
00138         /* unaligned transfer; could be slow */
00139         ctk_dma_transfer_unaligned(ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag, cmd);
00140         return;
00141     }
00142 
00143     DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n", 
00144         cmd, ls_addr, ea_hi32(ea_addr), ea_lo32(ea_addr), size, tag);
00145     spu_mfcdma64((volatile void*)ls_addr,
00146             ea_hi32(ea_addr), ea_lo32(ea_addr), size, tag, cmd);
00147 }
00148 
00158 static inline void
00159 ctk_dma_transfer(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, dma_size_t size, int tag, int cmd)
00160 {
00161     unsigned int ls_mod_15 = ptr2int(ls_addr) & 15;
00162     if (__builtin_expect(ls_mod_15 != (ea_addr & 15) || 
00163                          (ls_mod_15 & (size - 1)), 0)) {
00164         /* unaligned transfer; could be slow */
00165         ctk_dma_transfer_unaligned(ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag, cmd);
00166         return;
00167     }
00168 
00169     ctk_uint32_t bs = 0;
00170     ea_addr32_t hi32 = ea_hi32(ea_addr);
00171     ea_addr32_t lo32 = ea_lo32(ea_addr);
00172     for ( ; bs + DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE < size; bs += DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE) {
00173         DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p+%d, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n",
00174             cmd, ls_addr, bs, hi32, lo32 + bs, DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag);
00175         spu_mfcdma64((volatile void*)int2ptr(ptr2int(ls_addr) + bs),
00176             hi32, lo32 + bs, DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag, cmd);
00177     } 
00178     DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p+%d, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n",
00179         cmd, ls_addr, bs, hi32, lo32 + bs, size - bs, tag);
00180     spu_mfcdma64((volatile void*)int2ptr(ptr2int(ls_addr) + bs),
00181         hi32, lo32 + bs, size - bs, tag, cmd);
00182 }
00183

00198 static inline void ctk_dma_get_small(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, dma_size_t size, int tag) __attribute__((always_inline));
00199 static inline void
00200 ctk_dma_get_small(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, dma_size_t size, int tag)
00201 {
00202     ctk_dma_transfer_small(ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag, MFC_GET_CMD);
00203 }
